subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Miller, who fortified Baltimore’s bullpen during the latter part of last season and has given the Yankees a lift this year, illustrates how a move at the trading deadline can change a team’s postseason trajectory.
snippet: Miller, who fortified Baltimore’s bullpen during the latter part of last season and has given the Yankees a lift this year, illustrates how a move at the trading deadline can change a team’s postseason trajectory.
